title: Searching Through Iterators
description: In this lab, we learn about the Iterator::find function in Rust, which iterates over an iterator and searches for the first value that satisfies a given condition. If none of the values satisfy the condition, it returns None.

meta.title: Searching Through Iterators in Rust
meta.description: Learn how to use the Iterator::find function in Rust to search for the first value that satisfies a given condition.
meta.keywords: rust playground, coding, rust online compiler, iterators, rust tutor, rust commands, find, rust online playground, rust practice, rust online
